definition: to change color/to discolor/to change countenance/to become angry
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to suddenly change color showing displeasure, bewilderment etc
to change color and alter one's expression (idiom); to go white with fear/out of one's wits
to turn green at the mention of sex/prudish

sentences.english: Put'em in a glass and watch them divide…lotza fun.
sentences.chinese: 分入玻杯，注視其變色的過程。

sentences.english: The chameleon's skin replicates the pattern of its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 變色龍的皮膚可隨環境的模式而改變顏色。

sentences.english: It then lies still, waiting for prey to pass by.
sentences.chinese: 變色完成後，它就一動不動，等獵物經過。

sentences.english: She is very beautiful, I bet this is the most beautiful in the world chameleon.
sentences.chinese: 她真漂亮，我敢打賭，這是全世界最漂亮的變色龍。

sentences.english: This ink will not change colour.
Why does the color of the Kanas Lake water change?
sentences.chinese: 喀納斯湖的湖水爲什麼會變色呢？

sentences.english: Leaves have already started to colour; it will soon be winter.
sentences.chinese: 樹葉已開始變色，冬季即將來臨。

sentences.english: We must not change its colour now.
Nails with ringworm may become thick and discoloured , and will sometimes start to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 釘子與癬可能成爲厚和變色，有時會開始崩潰。

sentences.english: The eyes of anole can be versatile.
sentences.chinese: 變色龍的眼睛可以轉動。

sentences.english: The quantitative theory of optimum doping content of transparent conductive films was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹電致變色薄材料最佳摻雜含量的定量理論。

sentences.english: Color changable and with design of storage light.
sentences.chinese: 此膜有變色效果，並印有可蓄光圖案。

sentences.english: Strung on a coat of mail, they sparkle in a dramatic gradation of winter tones.
sentences.chinese: 盔甲似的設想，閃現出注目誘人的冬日幻變色彩。

sentences.english: Used to create effects of gradated tone; ideal for retouching photographs.
sentences.chinese: 用來創造漸變色調的效果，是修描相片的理想工具。

sentences.english: For chameleons this is a defense strategy, is it the same for us?
sentences.chinese: 對於變色龍來說，這叫做保護色，對我們也是這樣嗎？

sentences.english: One's face does not change colour, nor does one's heart beat faster -- without a trace of fear.

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
